textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},
Following an audit on your invoices sent to customers after their purchases on Back Market, we realized that the documents sent by your teams do not comply with the legal requirements in force. In this regard, we would like to provide you with all the necessary elements to bring these invoices into compliance as quickly as possible.
As a reminder, here are the mentions that must at least appear in each of your invoices:
Seller information - Social designation or name - Head office or home - SIRET N - Individual VAT identification number
Customer Information - Name and surname - Address
Billing details - Date - Invoice No.
Details on service provision - Operation date (if different from the invoice) - Quantity and precise designation of the good(s) sent - Price, taxes not included - Discounts (if applicable) - Delivery charges - VAT rate in force in the country of delivery - VAT amount Total Amount, including VAT
If you are eligible to apply marginal VAT for the product sold, these last three points are not necessary but must be replaced by: - Mention 'VAT not applicable "Second-hand goods "'. - Total amount, VAT Included
During the review of one of your last invoices, we found missing information in the following categories: {!$Record.Missing_elements__c}.
We would like to remind you of the importance of these requirements in order to fulfill our legal obligations to the tax authorities. We therefore ask you to make all the necessary changes within 30 days and to provide proof of your compliance to your Seller Success Manager.
After this period, we reserve the right to take any action we deem necessary (including suspending your account, limiting sales, or closing your account). All information is available in this FAQ article, do not hesitate to keep us informed of any difficulties encountered in updating your invoice templates. https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360019750759-How-to-establish-a-B2C-invoice-that-is-compliant-with-the-law-
Thank you for your immediate attention, The Back Market Team

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_Great_Debt
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


We are sorry to notice that you have a negative balance in your Back Market wallet superior to {!$Record.Currency__c}10k.


As a consequence, we hereby notify you, in accordance with article 18.2 of our sellers general terms and conditions, that, unless you regularize your account by paying the invoice available in the invoice tab of your Back Office on the Back Markets account (please specify your PK number and the invoice number as the reason for payment), we will close your seller account in 30 days as from today and our collaboration shall terminate.


After this 30-days period, you will therefore not be able to sell nor to buy back products on our websites. Of course, this notice period is subject to your strict respect of our general terms and conditions and of the Charter. As from tomorrow and until you regularize your account, your sale will be limited to 1 per day.


We remind you that all orders placed on our websites before the closure of your seller account must be executed in accordance with our general terms and conditions and the Charter.


As regards to after sale services and warranties, as from today, we will process all of the Buyers requests and complaints relating to you in your name and on your behalf, under the conditions set forth under articles 13 and 14 of our general terms and conditions for sellers.


Best regards,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_minor_debt
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


We are sorry to see that you have a negative balance in your Back Market wallet. You can find the exact amount in your invoice in the invoice tab of your Back Office.

Please use the Back Market bank details to make such payment. Thanks for regularizing your account in the next 10 days.

Please specify your PK number and the invoice number as the reason for payment.


Thanks in advance.

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_MOP_LastChance_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


We are writing to inform you that your recent mystery order results on Back Market were critically lower than the quality standards outlined in the Quality Charter. Mystery orders are a way for us to randomly verify that Sellers are complying with their obligations under the sellers Terms and Conditions and the schedules thereto, in particular the Quality Charter.


Please find attached the report link explaining the detail of the mystery order: {!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Link_to_the_MO__c}

Please find the reason(s) for the failure of your mystery order: {!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Reason_for_failure__c}


We thank you to remedy this situation in the best delay, and to meet the expected quality standards within 30 days. During this delay, your sales account will be limited to {!$Record.AlertLimitation__c} sales per day (i.e. approximately 30% of your average daily sales volume made over the last 30 days), provided that you are not already subject to another stricter sales restriction during this period, in accordance with article 17 of our sellers T&Cs.


After this delay, we will place a new mystery order on your account. In the event that its results are not satisfactory (Inspection score below 80% or a critical quality standard is not met), we will close your account and our business relationship shall terminate, as provided for under Articles 12 and 18.2 of the Terms and Conditions.


For more information about Mystery order tests and scoring, as well as tools and levers to improve your refurbishing and testing processes, please consult the seller Support Center (find the link at the bottom).

Your Back Market contact is available to work with you to clarify and analyze the situation and jointly build an action plan to address issues. 


We value your presence on our platform as an esteemed partner, and we sincerely hope we can resolve the situation and avoid closing your account. Please feel free to reach out if you have additional questions.


Sincerely, 

Back Market

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_MOP_LastChance_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Mystery Order - Last chance to meet Back Market quality standards

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_MOP_MP_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


We are writing to inform you that your recent mystery order on Back Market did not meet the quality standards outlined in the Quality Charter. Mystery orders are a way for us to randomly verify that Sellers are complying with their obligations under the sellers Terms and Conditions and the schedules thereto, in particular the Quality Charter.


Please find attached the report link summarizing the details of your mystery order: {!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Link_to_the_MO__c}

Please find the reason(s) for the failure of your mystery order: {!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Reason_for_failure__c}


We invite you to remedy this situation in the best delay, and by 30 days at the latest. 

After this delay, we will place a new mystery order on your account. In the event that its results are not satisfactory (Inspection score below 80% or a critical quality standard is not met), your sales capacity will automatically be limited to a stricter percentage of your sales volume, in accordance with articles 12 and 17 of our sellers T&Cs. We hope no limitation will be necessary, as we view you as a valuable partner on our platform. 


For more information about Mystery order tests and scoring, as well as tools and levers to improve your refurbishing and testing processes, please consult the seller Support Center (find the link at the bottom).


Your Back Market contact is available to work with you to clarify and analyze the situation and jointly build an action plan to address issues. 


Sincerely, 

Back Market

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_MOP_MP_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Mystery Order - Monitoring to meet Back Market quality standards

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Subject
textTemplates.text: Your invoices do not respect your legal requirements.

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Subject_great_debt
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Alert - Negative balance

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Subject_minor_debt
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Alert - Negative balance

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body
textTemplates.text:
Cher {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},
Suite un audit sur les factures envoyes aux clients aprs leurs achats sur Back Market, nous nous sommes aperus que les documents envoys par vos quipes ne sont pas conformes aux exigences lgales en vigueur. Nous souhaitons ce propos vous fournir tous les lments ncessaires pour mettre ces factures en conformit et ce le plus rapidement possible.
Pour rappel, voici les mentions qui doivent a minima obligatoirement figurer dans chacune de vos factures :
Informations vendeur - Dsignation sociale ou nom - Sige social ou domicile - N SIRET - Numro individuel didentification la TVA
Informations client - Nom et prnom - Adresse
Dtail de facturation - Date - N de Facture
Dtail sur la prestation de service - Date dopration (si diffrente de la facture) - Quantit et dsignation prcise du/des bien(s) envoy(s) - Prix, taxes non incluses - Remises (si applicable) - Frais de livraison - Taux TVA en vigueur dans le pays de livraison - Montant de la TVA - Montant Total, TVA incluse
Si vous tes ligible pour le produit vendu appliquer une TVA sur marge, ces trois derniers points ne sont pas ncessaires mais doivent imprativement tre remplacs par : - Mention TVA non applicable Rgime particulier - Biens d'occasion - Montant total, TVA Incluse
Lors de lexamen de lune de vos dernires factures, nous avons relev des informations manquantes dans les catgories suivantes : {!$Record.Missing_elements__c}.
Nous vous rappelons limportance de ces exigences qui permettent de remplir nos obligations lgales auprs des administrations fiscales. Nous vous demandons donc deffectuer lensemble des modifications ncessaires sous 30 jours et dapporter la preuve de votre mise en conformit votre Seller Success Manager. Pass ce dlai, nous nous rservons le droit de prendre les mesures que nous jugerons ncessaires (pouvant aller jusqu une suspension de votre compte, une limitation des ventes, ou une fermeture de votre compte). Toutes les informations sont disponibles dans cet article FAQ, nhsitez pas nous tenir informs des difficults rencontres dans la mise jour de vos modles de facture. https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/360019750759-Comment-%C3%A9tablir-une-facture-B2C-conforme-%C3%A0-la-r%C3%A8glementation-
Merci pour votre implication, Lquipe Back Market.

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_great_debt
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Nous avons le regret de constater que votre porte-monnaie virtuel prsente un solde ngatif de plus de 10k.


Par consquent, nous vous notifions par la prsente, conformment l'article 18.2 de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs, que si vous ne rgularisez pas la situation en payant la facture disponible dans l'onglet facture de votre Back office sur le RIB de Back Market (merci de prciser votre numro PK et le numro de la facture comme motif de paiement), nous clturerons votre compte vendeur lexpiration dune priode de 30 jours, et notre collaboration prendra dfinitivement fin.


Aprs cette priode de 30 jours, vous ne pourrez alors plus ni vendre sur nos Sites, ni procder la reprise de produits via nos Sites. Bien entendu, ce pravis est accord sous rserve du strict respect, compter de ce jour, de nos Conditions Gnrales Vendeurs et de la Charte en vigueur. A compter de demain et jusqu la rgularisation de votre situation, vos ventes seront limites 1 vente par jour.


Nous vous rappelons que toute commande ralise sur nos Sites avant la date darrt des ventes doit tre gre selon les rgles dcrites dans nos Conditions Gnrales Vendeurs et notre Charte Qualit.


Par ailleurs, concernant les garanties et SAV en cours, nous nous substituons vous et traiterons lintgralit des demandes ou rclamations dAcheteurs vous concernant, en votre nom et pour votre compte, compter de ce jour, dans les conditions des articles 13 et 14 de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs.


Cordialement,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_minor_debt
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Nous avons le regret de constater que votre porte-monnaie virtuel prsente un solde ngatif. Vous pouvez trouver la facture rgulariser dans l'onglet facture de votre Back Office.

Vous trouverez sur ce lien le RIB de Back Market sur lequel raliser votre paiement. Merci de rgulariser votre situation dans les 10 prochains jours.

Nous vous remercions de prciser votre numro PK et le numro de la facture comme motif de paiement.


En vous en remerciant par avance.

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_MOP_LastChance_Body
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Cet email a pour but de vous informer que la rcente commande mystre laquelle vous avez t sujet sur Back Market est significativement en dessous des normes de qualit dcrites dans la Charte Qualit. Les commandes mystres sont un moyen pour nous de contrler alatoirement le respect par les Vendeurs de leurs obligations rsultant de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs et leurs annexes, en particulier la Charte Qualit.


Vous trouverez ci-dessous le dtail de lanalyse de votre commande mystre: 

{!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Link_to_the_MO__c}

ainsi que les raisons de son chec: {!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Reason_for_failure__c}


Nous vous remercions de remdier cette situation et de respecter les normes de qualit attendues dans un dlai de 30 jours. Pendant ce dlai, votre compte vendeur sera, conformment larticle 17 de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs, limit {!$Record.AlertLimitation__c} ventes par jour (soit environ 30% de votre volume de ventes quotidien moyen ralis au cours des 30 derniers jours), sous rserve que vous ne soyez pas dj sujet aucune autre restriction similaire sur cette priode.


A lissue de ce dlai de 30 jours, nous effectuerons une nouvelle commande mystre. Dans le cas o le score final serait en dessous de 80% ou quune norme qualit importante ne serait pas respecte, nous fermerons votre compte vendeur sur notre plateforme et notre relation commerciale prendra fin, comme le prvoient les articles 12 et 18.2 de nos CGV. Nous esprons sincrement que nous n'en arriverons pas l et sommes votre disposition pour rpondre toute question. 


Pour plus d'informations sur les commandes mystres ainsi que les outils et leviers pour amliorer vos processus de reconditionnement et de test, veuillez consulter notre centre dassistance marchands le seller Support Center (veuillez trouver le lien en fin de mail).


Votre contact Back Market est galement disponible pour travailler avec vous afin d'analyser la situation et d'laborer conjointement un plan d'action pour rsoudre les problmes rencontrs. 


Sincrement, 

Back Market

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_MOP_LastChance_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Mystery Order - Dernire chance pour rpondre aux normes de qualit Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_MOP_MP_Body
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Cet email a pour but de vous informer que la rcente commande mystre laquelle vous avez t sujet sur Back Market conformment nos conditions gnrales de vente ne rpond pas aux normes de qualit dcrites dans la Charte Qualit. Les commandes mystres sont un moyen pour nous de contrler alatoirement le respect par les Vendeurs de leurs obligations rsultant de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs et leurs annexes, en particulier la Charte Qualit.


Vous trouverez ci-dessous le dtail de lanalyse de votre commande mystre:

{!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Link_to_the_MO__c}

ainsi que les raisons de son chec: {!e1f1efd9-45f4-4a5c-9fbb-79d57b7e0f37.Reason_for_failure__c}


Nous vous invitons remdier ces manquements dans les meilleurs dlais, et au plus tard sous trente jours. 

Pass ce dlai, nous effectuerons une nouvelle commande mystre. Dans le cas o le score final serait en dessous de 80%, ou quune norme qualit importante ne serait alors pas respecte, votre volume de vente sera automatiquement limit, conformment aux articles 12 et 17 de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs. Nous esprons qu'aucune limitation ne sera ncessaire, car nous considrons votre compte comme un partenaire prcieux sur la plateforme. 


Pour plus d'informations sur les commandes mystres ainsi que les outils et leviers pour amliorer vos processus de reconditionnement et de test, veuillez consulter notre centre dassistance marchands le seller Support Center (veuillez trouver le lien en fin de mail).


Votre contact Back Market est galement disponible pour travailler avec vous afin d'analyser la situation et d'laborer conjointement un plan d'action pour rsoudre les problmes rencontrs. 


Sincrement, 

Back Market

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_US_Body_great_debt
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


We are sorry to notice that you have a negative balance in your Back Market wallet superior to $10k.


As a consequence, we hereby notify you, in accordance with article 18.2 of our sellers general terms and conditions, that, unless you regularize your account by paying the invoice available in the invoice tab of your Back Office on the Back Markets account (please specify your PK number and the invoice number as the reason for payment), we will close your seller account in 30 days as from today and our collaboration shall terminate.

After this 30-days period, you will therefore not be able to sell nor to buy back products on our websites. Of course, this notice period is subject to your strict respect of our general terms and conditions and of the Charter. As from tomorrow and until you regularize your account, your sale will be limited to 1 per day.


We remind you that all orders placed on our websites before the closure of your seller account must be executed in accordance with our general terms and conditions and the Charter.


As regards to after sale services and warranties, as from today, we will process all of the Buyers requests and complaints relating to you in your name and on your behalf, under the conditions set forth under articles 13 and 14 of our general terms and conditions for sellers.


Best regards,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_US_Body_minor_debt

Hello,


We are sorry to see that you have a negative balance in your Back Market wallet. You can find the exact amount in your invoice in the invoice tab of your Back Office.

Please use the Back Market bank details to make such payment. Thanks for regularizing your account in the next 10 days.

Please specify your PK number and the invoice number as the reason for payment.


Thanks in advance.

Back Market
